name: Everybody Stay Calm
description:
A frantic arcade shooter game made for GDEX jam 2021 using the theme "calm"

You are a robot created to defend the planet from alien invaders.  Collect the dropped alien tech to power up and use their scrap metal to repair yourself.

WASD - Move 

Space (or W) - Jump

Mouse - Aim and Shoot

Shift - Dash (after unlocked)

I did all the art in Pyxl Edit and the game was made in Construct 2.  I ran out of time before adding many of my planned features.
